1.「何度も往復させて すまんな <pc>。| ふたりが 破邪の秘技の試練に向かう前: I'm sorry to keep sending you back and forth<pc> I'm sorry. There's something I need to tell|you before we head into the trials of the|secret arts of destruction.

2.「レビュール街道北の 王家の墓の下に| 人知れず広がる 迷宮についての話だ。: I'm talking about the labyrinth that|stretches beneath the royal tombs north of|the Reveille Road.

4.「王家の迷宮……。| 聞いたことがありませんが それは？: The royal labyrinth... I've never heard of|it. What is it?

5.「王家の者でも 知る者は限られている。| 勇者とその盟友がそろった 今だからこそ:
Only a few of the royal family know of its|existence. Now that the hero and his allies|are here, it is only right that we reveal his|
|existence...

6.「今の ふたりの修行の場として| 最も適切であると 判断したからだ。: I have decided that this is the most|appropriate place for the two of us to|train...

8.「アンルシアが 破邪の秘技を会得したとて| そなたたち自身が 強くならなければ|:
Even if you've mastered the secret art of|evil, you'll never be able to defeat the|Great Demon Lord and his army if you don't|
|become stronger yourselves.

9.「だが 王家の迷宮に 挑むことで| 勇者と盟友は さらなる成長を 望めるだろう。: But by tackling the royal labyrinth, the hero|and his allies can grow even more...|Therefore, I will open the royal labyrinth...

10.「現世と霊界の狭間にある 王家の迷宮に挑むには| 肉体という衣を脱ぎ 精神体と化:
In order to challenge the royal labyrinth|that lies between this world and the spirit|world, one must shed the garb of the body and|
|become a spirit. I believe this is the|doorway to that...

11.「扉の向こうは 王家の墓へと つながっている。| 中に入ったら 奥にある大扉をく: The doors lead to the royal tombs. Once|inside, go through the great door at the back|and you'll find yourself in a labyrinth...

12.「……さて。実際に 行く前に| いくつか 王家の迷宮について| 聞いておいてもら: ..... Before you actually go, there are a few|things you should know about the Royal|Labyrinth...

14.「それと 探索の途中で 迷宮の外に出る時は| この うつしよのカギが必要になる。: Also, if you want to leave the labyrinth|during your quest, you'll need this key of|the Utsushiyo. And if I leave it with you...

18.<color_yellow>迷宮に入るには 勇気の輝石が必要です。|勇気の輝石は:
In order to enter the labyrinth, you need a|bravery stone... You can get 15 gems of|courage a week, and the rest can be found at|
|the door of light...

19.「ありがとうございます ルシェンダさま。| 私と <pc>のふたりは| 王家の迷: Thank you, Luchen... With me.<pc> The two of you are going to train in the|royal labyrinth.

20.「王家の迷宮は 未知なる領域だ。| 少しずつ チカラをつけながら| 徐々に進んで: The royal labyrinth is an unknown... If we|move forward, little by little, as we gain|strength...

21.「……その果てに 何が待つのかは| まだ 誰にも わからない。| 決して 無理は: ... No one knows yet what awaits us at the|end. Don't push yourself...

22.<pc>は|うつしよのカギ（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！<me 60>: <pc> I've got the key of the Utux, the most|important thing!<me 60>

23.<color_yellow>光の扉からは アンルシアの|装備変更や スキル振り分: <color_yellow>From the Door of Light, you can change|Anrushia's equipment and assign her skills...
